attributes.action: Public inquiry into DVSA notices to remove ADIs/PDIs
attributes.additional_details:
The inquiry should determine the truth, accountability for decision making & solutions, and should have the scope and powers including:
 
The DVSA issuing removal notices to instructors who don’t return their licence as when they resume work they face difficulty renewing car insurance, certificates & DBS checks  
Number of ADIs/PDIs removed from the DVSA register
Impact of loss of jobs on ADIs/PDIs and their families
Obtain all records from DVSA/DfT
The role of Ministers at the Department for Transport
attributes.background: Call Government to hold urgent inquiry of Driver & Vehicle Standards Agency notices of removal from DVSA Register of Approved Driving Instructors (ADIs) who cancel a Standards Check & PDIs a Part 3 Test due to COVID-19, underlying health issues, family concerns & elderly relatives on dialysis etc.
